alert.note: Alert for Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; East Valley; Fountain Hills, East Mesa; Mazatzal Mountains; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Rio Verde, Salt River; Scottsdale, Paradise Valley; Southeast Valley, Queen Creek; Tonto Basin (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 13 at 5:23AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Gila, Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 600 AM MST... At 521 AM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a couple of clusters of strong thunderstorms between Apache Junction and Tortilla Flat, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mesa, Apache Junction, East Mesa, Granite Reef Dam, Gold Camp, Falcon Field Airport, Lost Dutchman State Park, Goldfield, Usery Mountain Park, Saguaro Lake, Canyon Lake, Superstition Mountains, Goldfield Ranch, Four Peaks, Kings Ranch, Apache Lake, Salt River Tubing Recreation Area, and Tortilla Flat. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 189 and 202. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 184 and 204. AZ Route 202 between mile markers 20 and 34. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
